item.title: EECE454-23F
item.description: EECE454: Introduction to ML Systems (Fall 2023) # Team # Instructor. Jaeho Lee 이재호 firstname.lastname@postech.ac.kr TA. Minkyu Kim 김민규 firstname.lastname@postech.ac.kr Location & Time # Class. Mondays/Wednesdays, 09:30AM–10:45AM @ 106 LG Hall Office Hr. Wednesdays, 10:50AM–11:50AM @ 407 Eng Bldg 2 Schedule (tentative) # W1. Introduction / Basic Math for ML (9/4, 9/6) W2. Math for ML / Simple Models (9/11, 9/13) W3. Support Vector Machines (9/18, 9/20) W4. K-Means Clustering
